title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 280.5 - Calculation of the restaurant return-to-work tax credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 280.5 - Calculation of the restaurant return-to-work tax credit

State Regulations
(a) An applicant
for the restaurant return-to-work tax credit that meets the eligibility
requirements of section
280.4
of this Part may be eligible
to claim a credit equal to $5,000 per each full-time equivalent net employee
increase as defined in section
280.2
(n) of this

Part. (b) An applicant may not
receive in excess of $50,000 in tax credits under this program. (c) The restaurant return-to-work tax credit
shall be refundable as provided in the Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
280.5

Adopted

New

York State Register December 22, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/22/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
